sentences.sentence: Walt Disney stayed true to his ideals.
sentences.translation: 沃尔特·迪斯尼坚持他的理想。

sentences.sentence: He remained faithful to the ideals of the party.
sentences.translation: 他对党的理想坚贞不移。

sentences.sentence: They justify villainy in the name of high ideals.
sentences.translation: 他们打着实现远大理想的幌子为他们的恶行开脱。
